DOC.brief_title: The Assessment Effect Vitamin D Supplementation Inflammatory Endothelial Factors Patients With Type 2 Diabetes .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study determine effect vitamin D placebo 3 month gene expression plasma human cartilage glycoprotein 39 ( YKL40 ) , receptor advance glycation end product ( RAGE ) glyoxalase enzyme peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMC ) serum level YKL40 , plasminogen activator inhibitor-1 ( PAI-1 ) , TNF-α , advance glycation end product ( AGEs ) , IL-6 , HbA1c diabetes type 2 patient . In randomized , double-blind clinical trial , placebo-controlled study , 84 woman men type 2 diabetes enrol Iranian Center diabetes . At start study , participant sign inform consent complete general information form . 24-hour food record 3 day take patient begin end study . Selected sample use stratified randomization method base sex , gender body mass index ( BMI ) classify 2 group : 1 ) receive vitamin D supplement 2 ) receive vitamin D placebo bo . The vitamin D supplement group receive 4000 IU ( 100 microgram ) daily 3 month . The vitamin D placebo group also receive placebo contain starch similar term color , shape size . participant advise maintain diet , level physical activity medication dose study . Blood sample collect anthropometric parameter measure target biochemical parameter , gene expression serum level physical activity measure trial .
DOC.criteria: diabetic type 2 patient 3565 year old , body mass index range 18.5 30 , literate , willingness participation , avoidance dietary supplement , vitamin herbal product least 3 month throughout intervention people use vitamin D supplement last 3 month , chronic renal disease , GI disease , Hepatobilliary diseases , hematological disorder , hypo hyperthyroidism , treatment orlistat sibutramine weight loss , pregnancy lactation , treatment insulin Thiazolidinediones , Smokers , sever change regular diet life style , change type dosage regular medication ( )
